I am Prasoon Majumdar, a seasoned **Data Engineering and DevOps leader** based in Bangalore, India. My day-to-day work involves leading **cloud migration initiatives**, managing **distributed system frameworks**, and fostering **quality assurance processes** to enhance system reliability. Currently, I am pursuing a **Master’s in Artificial Intelligence** at IIIT Kottayam, blending academic rigor with my professional experience.

Over the years, I have worked in strategic roles at **Haleon**, **Avaamo**, and **People10 Technosoft**, developing expertise in **MLOps**, **cloud computing**, and **DevOps practices**. I have led impactful projects such as creating **data observability frameworks**, scaling AI chatbot products, and coordinating multi-project resource management.

I enjoy implementing research ideas and developing scalable solutions in AI and data engineering. My projects include building **CNN models for image classification**, developing **auto-encoders for image colorization**, and analyzing Indian climate data. With a strong focus on **technical innovation and stakeholder collaboration**, I strive to align technology with strategic goals.

For more details on my work experience, check out my [LinkedIn profile](#) or [GitHub](#).
